title: Immersive VR-Based Collaborative Mathematical Problem-Solving Project

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts (secondary education level)
context.additional_context: Job-Integrated Mathematics Learning Program for Working Professionals: Modeling Social Exclusion Scenarios Mathematically in VR and Exploring Solutions via Project-Based Learning

learning_goals: Learners can convert social issues (e.g., resource distribution inequality) presented in VR simulations into mathematical models.
Learners can derive problem-solving strategies by sharing and integrating insights gained from VR experiences through collaborative group dialogue.
Guided by instructors, learners can analyze physical responses (eye movement, gestures, etc.) in VR environments and apply them to problem-solving processes.

resources: Two sets of high-spec VR headsets

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
